mapper.select: SELECT I.DEBATE_ID, T.MEETING_TYPE, P.DEBATE_TYPE, I.TITLE, I.OUTLINE, B.DESCRIPTION, B.AUTHOR, B.TITLE AS BOOK_TITLE, TO_DATE(I.DEBATE_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DEBATE_START_DATE, TO_DATE(I.DEBATE_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DEBATE_END_DATE, DB.DEBATE_BOOK_ID, DB.ISBN13, B.COVER FROM TBL_DEBATE I JOIN TBL_MEETING_TYPE T ON I.MEETING_ID = T.MEETING_ID JOIN TBL_DEBATE_TYPE P ON I.DEBATE_TYPE_ID = P.DEBATE_TYPE_ID JOIN TBL_DEBATE_BOOK DB ON I.DEBATE_ID = DB.DEBATE_ID JOIN TBL_BOOK B ON DB.ISBN13 = B.ISBN13 WHERE (MEETING_TYPE = '오프라인' OR MEETING_TYPE = '온라인') AND DEBATE_END_DATE > SYSDATE ORDER BY DEBATE_ID DESC
SELECT LIBCODE, LIBNAME, ADDRESS, CLOSED, HOMEPAGE, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, TEL FROM TBL_LIB WHERE LIBNAME LIKE '%' || #{libname} || '%'

SELECT BC.COMMENT_ID, BC.ISBN13, BC.BOOK_COMMENT, TO_DATE(BC.BOOK_DATE, ('YYYY-MM-DD')) AS BOOK_DATE, B.MEMBER_ID, B.NICKNAME, P.PROFILE_UPLOAD, P.PROFILE_UUID, P.PROFILE_NAME FROM TBL_BOOK_COMMENT BC JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON BC.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID JOIN TBL_PROFILE P ON B.MEMBER_ID = P.MEMBER_ID WHERE ISBN13 = #{isbn13} order by COMMENT_ID DESC
